title: PBE Signup
body: I applied for a PBE account a few months back, like about 4-5 maybe, I was just wondering how long does it normally take for an account to be accepted?

replies.body:
There's no set amount of time for getting into the PBE. We send invites out in waves, and our criteria for how we choose testers changes *a lot*. In general, though, we look for really active players that are a positive influence on the community and would provide great feedback.

At this point, being patient to see if an invite comes your way is all that can be done. You can check out our [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) if you'd like more information on the PBE system. Let me know if you have any questions.
